name: Synchroni-City
description:
Serzo is the sole heir to the throne of Synchronicity. On his 10th birthday, he was given a flute of ‘tremendous power’ by the mysterious court jester, who told him it would be useful in his time of need. Years later, his father unexpectedly passed and Serzo’s succession came upon him, but he buckled under the pressure and ran to his flute, playing it to himself in solace. A virulent curse was unleashed from the instrument, summoning monsters into the city as he watched it quickly descend into chaos. He fled to the edge of the city, looking to leave it all behind but found the gates sealed. Faced with his mistakes, he has decided to set things right and return peace to Synchronicity, but not without the help of others

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AoXjLiu0QErbdFdrvy66Aa2ctBoNgpqb/view?usp=shari... playthrough of the game
